snippet.title: Mala Petaka - Official Demo Update Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Check out the action-packed trailer for Mala Petaka to see gameplay and the colorful world of this 2D pixel art shooter sci-fi FPS. In Mala Petaka, you play as 'Petaka', an angry amnesiac who just wants to kill every ugly green alien and annoying drone he encounters while trying to restore his memories by exploring various universes through warp portals. An updated demo for Mala Petaka is available now on Steam.
